function NPC_102112:Init(NPCID) -- 1: 머리 -- 2: 꼬리 NPC_ReserveUserData(NPCID, 2)
local MaxHP = NPC_102112.MaxHP NPC_102112.LimitForBreakTail = MaxHP/10 NPC_102112.LimitForPain = MaxHP/10
NPC_102112.TalIdPain1 = 210211109 NPC_102112.TalIdPain2 = 210211110
NPC_102112.DistanceForScrifice = 800
NPC_102112.BufIdSacrifice = 40190 NPC_102112.BufIdLinkage = 40191 end
function NPC_102112:OnSpawn( Info ) this:GainBuff( NPC_102111.BufIdRedEye ) end
function NPC_102112:AccDamage(bHead, dHitInfo) local victim = AsNPC( dHitInfo.Victim ) local attacker = dHitInfo.Attacker local totalDamage = 0 local currentDamage = 0 local currentTalent = victim:GetCurrentTalent() local userDataIdx = 1
if(bHead == false and (victim:CheckBPart(1) == true and victim:CheckBPart(2) == true and victim:CheckBPart(3) == true)) then return dHitInfo end
--[[ 꼬리쪽은 SLASH와 PIERCE가 아니면 누적 데미지에 패널티를 받는다. 머리쪽은 BLUNT가 아니면 누적데미지에 패널티를 받는다. 누적데미지는 파츠 파괴나 Pain패턴에 영향을 준다. --]]
if( bHead == false ) then userDataIdx = 2
if( dHitInfo.Type == DA_SLASH or dHitInfo.Type == DA_PIERCE ) then currentDamage = dHitInfo.Damage else currentDamage = dHitInfo.Damage * 0.2 end else if( dHitInfo.Type == DA_BLUNT ) then currentDamage = dHitInfo.Damage else currentDamage = dHitInfo.Damage * 0.8 end end
if currentDamage == 0 then return dHitInfo end
totalDamage = victim:GetUserData(userDataIdx) + currentDamage victim:SetUserData(userDataIdx, totalDamage)
-- GLog( "T:" .. totalDamage .. "\n" ) if bHead == true and totalDamage > NPC_102112.LimitForPain then -- _LogHitInfo( dHitInfo ) local bPain = 0
if ChkMFForHitReaction( dHitInfo ) then if not victim:IsCooldown( NPC_102112.TalIdPain1 ) then victim:ClearJob() victim:UseTalentSelf( NPC_102112.TalIdPain1 ) victim:SetUserData(userDataIdx, 0) end end end
return dHitInfo end
-- 머리 히트 function NPC_102112:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) return NPC_102112:AccDamage(true, HitInfo) end
-- 머리 히트 function NPC_102112:OnHitCapsule_2_0(HitInfo) return NPC_102112:AccDamage(true, HitInfo) end
-- 꼬리 히트 function NPC_102112:OnHitCapsule_2_2(HitInfo) return NPC_102112:AccDamage(false, HitInfo) end
function NPC_102112:OnVictory( ) this:SetUserData( 1, 0 ) this:SetUserData( 2, 0 ) end
-- 40191 중첩 버프 구현되면 중첩 버젼으로 변경할것 function NPC_102112:OnSpawn( Info ) local Summoner = this:GetSummoner() if Summoner == nil then return end
Summoner:GainBuff( NPC_102112.BufIdLinkage ) Summoner:SetUserData( 2, Summoner:GetUserData( 2 ) + 1 ) end
function NPC_102112:OnDie(Info)
local Summoner = this:GetSummoner() if Summoner == nil then return end
local Dist = this:DistanceTo(Summoner)
if Dist < NPC_102112.DistanceForScrifice then Summoner:GainBuff( NPC_102112.BufIdSacrifice ) end
Summoner:RemoveBuff( NPC_102112.BufIdLinkage ) Summoner:SetUserData( 2, Summoner:GetUserData( 2 ) - 1 ) this:Despawn(false) end
